import './card.css' import backgroundImage from '../sunnyday.jpg' export default function Card({loading, data, setCity, date}) { console.log(data) return (
{ loading ? Cargando : <> {/*
*/} {/* */} {data.name}
Icono {Math.round(data.main.temp)}°
{data.weather[0].main} Sensación térmica: {Math.round(data.main.feels_like)}°
{date}
}
) }
